title: 3.2 Master Challenge 1
question: Create a program using the turtle graphics module in Python that displays the title Ping Pong Game on the screen. The title should be in Comic Sans MS font, with a font size of 36, and in a bright green color ( #00FF00 ). The border around the title should be a rectangle, with a width of 10 pixels and red in color ( #FF0000 ). The title should be centered within the border. The program should display the title for 10 seconds before closing the turtle window
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java
